refnamediv.refpurpose: Making a dynamic blog posts using XML templates

itemizedlist.listitem: This demo makes a Weblog and posts into it using Metaweblog API two dynamic posts
The dynamic posts contains XML template(s) which will be executed at render time.
The first post makes a SQL quesry on Demo Database table 'Shippers' and inserts a table into the user's weblog.
The second post contains a XML Template containing a XQuery statement. It will render a table containing names from simple opml.xml file.
The following is a post content containing a XML Template with SQL Query: select 1 as tag , null as parent, CompanyName as [tr!1!td!element] from Demo.demo.Shippers for xml explicit

The following is a post content containing a XML Template with XQuery:
{ for $o in document ("opml.xml")//outline return { string ($o/@text) } } ]]>
The result from execution can be seen at http://host:port/weblog/bloguser/bloguser-blog-0. Note that demo's initial state MUST be set before hitting this link.
